title: You'll Never Believe The Conversation One Of Us Overheard In The Bathroom!
description:
Moe absolutely HATES having to use the public restroom. But sometimes, you can't hold it until you get home. In this case, Moe was rushing to the bathroom. But after he walked in, he was trapped!
Why? Because someone else walked in having a very uncomfortable conversation on the phone with someone. It was so uncomfortable Moe knew he couldn't leave until the guy left.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
